SettingLinkDataTableModal.setting: Setting Linked Data in Data Table Name
SettingLinkDataTableModal.select: First, select row of table which you want to link data together (it can link within same row only). After that, click + button to add selector as much as you want or click – button to delete selector which you don’t want. Moreover, each input box represents each cell in table row. If you input same value which you setting in input box when you use E-Form, the values from other input boxes that you setting will appear automatically. For example, define value in cell  datatable1_R1C1 = "Hello", datatable1_R1C2 = "99", datatable1_R1C3 = "World", when you input "99" in datatable1_R1C2, value in datatable1_R1C1 and datatable1_R1C3 will become "Hello" and "World" subsequently or input "Hello" in datatable1_R1C1, value in datatable1_R1C2 and datatable1_R1C3 will become "99" and "Word" subsequently. If you want to import selector from Excel, you have to input value in Excel start from A1. The value which you input in 1 row in Excel is data of 1 selector. If you want more selector, you have to input value in new row in Excel.

rejectModal.sure_reject: Do you want to reject document name

help_card.help_validate: It is condition for document validation. It can validate any object in document depend on specified condition. Putting object name in condition must put $ in front of object name. Operators which used in condiiton are following below.
help_card.length_meaning: Value of number characters in text. It must put after oject name.
help_card.and_sign: And (Use to connect many sub-conditions together and put parentheses cover each sub-condition before connection)
help_card.or_sign: Or (Use to connect many sub-conditions together and put parentheses cover each sub-condition before connection)

tips_data.moving_object: arrow keys: Used for moving object

tips_data.z_reverting: ctrl + z: Used for reverting an object that was previously deleted

tips_help_message.box_displaying: Used for displaying text in the document.
tips_help_message.box_filling: Box for filling data (1 line). If it is set to be number only, it can set condition of value which filled in input box by selecting condition and set value for condition. Value of condition can be number or value from other input box or calculate box (set by using object name).
tips_help_message.square_box: Square Box for drawing rectangle in the document.
tips_help_message.box_information: Box for filling data (more than 1 lines) and it can add variable for default value.
tips_help_message.box_information_editor: Box for filling data which a user can customize the styles
tips_help_message.box_selecting: Box for selecting date in the document.
tips_help_message.box_for_selecting: Box for selecting time in the document.
tips_help_message.check_box: Box for selecting the choice or not. It can group choice together by going to "Checkbox Group" in property tab and then input the name of check box which are in the same group (input 1 name per time). After that, click "+" button after input fill for adding this check box into the group. After grouping, it will has "Force to Fill In" property for forcing to select at least 1 choice from check box group.
tips_help_message.box_selecting_one: Box for selecting 1 choice from group of choices. It can change group of choices up to value from input box or other dropdown input by filling object name which want to refer value in "Reference of Group Choice" property and then click "Create / Edit" button in "Group Choice" property. It will has setting modal show up. Then, input name for group choice. The name must has the same value of input box or dropdown input which want to refer value. Finally, input choice in each group choice.
tips_help_message.automatic:
Box display automatic data from selected data.
        If select data "Condition", it will display result up to the specified condition. Format of condition is cond("condition"?show="result of true condition":show="result of false condition") or change show="result" to hide for hiding this input box auto up to its condition. It can has more than 1 condition like following format cond("condition1"?show="result of true condition1":"condition2"?show="result of true condition2":show="result of false condition"). For example, cond($dropdownbox0=="Y"?show="Yes":$dropdownbox0=="N"?show="No":show="Else"). Operators for using in condition have == (equal), != (not equal), >= (greater than or equal), <= (less than or equal), > (greater than) and < (less than). Text which use in condition must put inside (") or (') and the display result must begin with "show=" and put inside (") or ('). Condition can use with input box, dropdown box, calculate box, input box auto and check box (text condition of check box must be true if check box is selected and must be false if check box isn’t selected. Also, it doesn’t have to put inside (") or (')). If use these objects in condition, they must be put $ in front of their name. Beside, if each condition want to has many cases, it can use conjunction operators like &&(and), ||(or: in the same button of "\" in keyboard) to connect many cases together. For example, ($inputbox1=="58")||($inputbox1=="73").
tips_help_message.box_show:
Box for displaying result of input box, calculate box, date picker, time picker or number which is calculated from defined function. It put calculation inside calc(…) and use +, -, *, /, ( ), %. It can set number of decimal point for the result. If use value of input box or other calculate box in calculation, must put $ in front of input box or calculate box name. For example, calc(($calculatebox1*2)+ $inputbox2)
        Moreover, it can calculate by using following function
  • Modulate(%): The remainder of a division process. For example, calc(15%10), the result is 5.
  • Average: avg(inputbox1,inputbox2,...)
  • Minimum: min(inputbox1,inputbox2,...)
  • Maximum: max(inputbox1,inputbox2,...)
  • Difference of months: diffMon(datepickerbox1, datepickerbox2)
  • Difference of date: diffDate(datepickerbox1, datepickerbox2)
  • Length Between two days(days): lenDate(datepickerbox1, datepickerbox2)
  • Difference of time: diffTime(timebox1,timebox2)
  • Difference of time(hour only): diffTimeHr(timebox1, timebox2)
  • Difference of time(minute only): diffTimeMn(timebox1, timebox2)
  • Sum all rows in column of Data Table: sum(datatable1_RXC1)
  • Sum all rows in column of Data Table by condition: sumif(datatable1_RXC1: Condition)
tips_help_message.box_show_thai: Box for displaying changing of number to text which number is from input box (input box must set to number only) or calculate box.
tips_help_message.scope_box: Scope box for setting permission of inputting data in the document. Every objects in scope will be set permission of inputting up to permission of scope except some object that be set its own permission. If some section boxes are in difference position and require to have same permission (in same inputting step), must set at "Continuous Section" property and select section box which is in the same inputting permission.
tips_help_message.displaying: Table for displaying data which can link each other within the same row for getting data when data table’s cell has the same value with defined data. It can set by clicking "Setting Data Link" button in data table property. This make every cells in data table has dropdown input inside for selecting defined data.
tips_help_message.consists: Used for displaying table in the document. It can set width of each column and height of each row. Moreover, it can set width of all columns or height of all rows in 1 time.
tips_help_message.straight: Used for displaying line in the document. It can set to be vertical or horizon. It can change line style to be solid line, dash line or dot line.
tips_help_message.picture_box:
Image Box which can choose to be normal image in the document or box for inserting image in the document.
        If it is normal image, insert image into this image box. It can insert image from url or image file in pc (click in image box to select image file in pc). Image size will equal to size of image box.
        If it is box for inserting image, don’t have to insert image into image box. Image size will fit to shortest side of image box. It means that if height of image box shorter than width of image box, height of image will equal to height of image box and width of image will set to proper size automatically.
